name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fortnite - New tab - Current item shop

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace new tab screen with the current rotation of the Fortnite item shop

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple extension will replace your "New Tab" screen and show the current rotation of the Fortnite item shop.
